author: lgray
body:
Builds in hits from the backing hadron calorimeter to the HGCal reconstruction.
This is propagated from Digis through to SimClustering and final objects.

This PR also now introduces the fine-grained BH as the baseline HGCal backing calorimeter.
There were some necessary memory usage improvements because of the structure of HCAL database code. The HGCal digitizer has also been made to retain less memory, though peak usage is still about the same.
title: Introduce BH to HGCal Reconstruction workflows
